sentences.en: Conclusion: Maxium likelihood discriminant method is practical in quantitative diagnosis of syndromes of apoplectic sequela.
sentences.cn: 结论: 用最大似然判别法探讨中风后遗症中医证候计量诊断方法,有较好的实用价值.

sentences.en: Had the poor man been apoplectic, he could never have recovered from his paroxysm of wrath.
sentences.cn: 说真话,这个老实人要是万一现在带着这股气劲中风晕过去了, 那他准不会再活过来了.

sentences.en: He died from an apoplectic fit ( a stroke of apoplexy )
He was apoplectic with rage at the decision.
sentences.cn: 他对这个决定异常愤怒。

sentences.en: Is it the sound of apoplectic readers typing irate e-mails about the subject of this column?
sentences.cn: 是怒火中烧的读者在敲键盘、写邮件投诉这个专栏话题吗？

sentences.en: It is showed that combined acupuncture and medication is quite effective for ischemic apoplectic paralysis.
sentences.cn: 提示针药结合比单纯中药及常规组治疗缺血中风偏瘫疗效好.

sentences.en: It's enough to make them choke with apoplectic rage.
sentences.cn: 足以气得让他们说不出话来。

sentences.en: More to the point, her father would be apoplectic at the idea.
sentences.cn: 还有，孩子他爸可能会被女儿的这个主意引发中风的。

sentences.en: Objective: To explore the rule of quantitative diagnosis of syndromes in apoplectic sequela.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的: 探讨中风后遗症中医证候的计量诊断规律.

sentences.en: Purpose To observe the curative effect of magnetic field electric pulse plus stimulation on apoplectic hemiplegia.
sentences.cn: 目的观察磁场电脉冲配合穴位治疗中风偏瘫的疗效.

sentences.en: Purpose To observe the curative effect of resuscitating and scalp acupunctures on apoplectic hemiplegia.
sentences.cn: 目的观察醒脑开窍法与头针治疗中风偏瘫的疗效.

sentences.en: This article discussed the herbal treatment and rehabilitation of apoplectic sequelae.
sentences.cn: 从临床用药和功能锻炼两个方面探讨中风后遗症的康复治疗.

sentences.en: What food should apoplectic patient notice?
sentences.cn: 中风病人应该注意哪些饮食?

sentences.en: What symptom does apoplectic meeting have?

trans.tran_cn: 激动的，愤怒得脸发红的，中风的
